price: (40) Or do you, [O Muḥammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
